bug.author: AnnieWei58
bug.summary: [spawning jupyter failed] 'kubeflow-core' is not a component or a module
bug.description:
I am trying to spawn the jupyterhub, but it fails. When I try this line of code:
ks param set kubeflow-core jupyterNotebookPVCMount /home/jovyan/work
it gives me the following error:
could not find component: extracting module and component names from kubeflow-core: 'kubeflow-core' is not a component or a module
Environment:
Kubeflow version: v0.4.1 kfctl version: v0.5.1 Kubernetes platform: Kubeflow on Kubernetes Kubernetes version: v1.14.2 OS: Centos7
